thread.section_title: Maison Albar Hotel Paris Champs-Elysees - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Stay!
thread.title_full: Excellent Stay! - Review of Maison Albar Hotel Paris Champs-Elysees, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Jown25
title: Excellent Stay!
text: First time to Paris so I researched for a good location and hotel to stay at. After thorough comparison I decided to give Maison Albar a chance and I am really happy that I did! I came for a very special occassion, to surprise prorpose to my girlfriend, and I had emailed the hotel in advance to ask for anything special that they could do - i.e. room upgrade, super early check in. When I arrived at the hotel at 10:30am I was told that a room was not available but the person at the desk was extremely polite and helpful, took our bags and mentioned to come back after 1pm. When I came back we had an upgraded room and after proposing to my girlfriend that afternoon and coming back to our room we found a bottle of champagne and fruits waiting for us in the room, very classy by the hotel! We absolutely loved our quick 2 day trip to Paris and really enjoyed our stay at Maison Albar as we'll always remember it with a special memory. Definitely appreciate the kindness of the staff and we look forward to coming back!
